title: Zephaniah
desc: A trio of deadly entities, led by Zephaniah! Ironically, the shortest guy here. Zephaniah was actually created as a prank for a shoddy fangame, but somehow found his way on a public website where anyone could download him. Now, extracting the .ZIP file onto your PC will give him entirely free rein over your device. That's no good!
